QuestData.Title: Runs in the Family
QuestData.Description:
From the air, I scouted one of the artifacts Edress uncovered by the entrance of the ruins. Doubtless there are more inside.
They are warded somehow, though I will need to get closer before I can examine them. The magic here is very old.
The grounds appear deserted, but I wouldn't trust that to last long once we start meddling. Keep an eye out. We will uncover all we can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the Obsidian Observatory for clues about the dracthyr's past.
